data.system_settings: iPhone XS Max, iOS 12.1.1, Dev Beta 3
data.actual_result: Navigation bar overlaps various UI elements
data.expected_result: Navigation bar does not overlap various UI elements
data.short_description: [MASTER TICKET - iPhone X Devices] Through the application the navigation bar overlaps various elements of the UI
data.steps_to_repro: - View any of these locations: - Last person in friends list - Bottom user in list of reactions to a message - Push-to-talk button in DM voice call - Button to change email while email verification is requested - Button linking to support when phone verification required - Join server button when invited to a server (and button to close when the invite is expired) - Server privacy settings - List of channels in server settings > channels - Bottom language in user settings - Quick switcher error text cut off - Top buttons on full user profiles are positioned incorrectly with and without notes opened - Last message in search results with only one page - Set status menu - Mini profiles - Bottom pinned message - Filter recent mentions menu - Share invite button - Filtering by role in member list - Last result in quick switcher with keyboard closed - Last user in member list - Last member in banned users list - Last user when adding users to group DMs - Role colour menu - Bottom role in server settings > roles - Bottom invite in server settings > invites
